element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm performs multiple regression analysis, studying the relation between several variables.
It takes a points layer containing information about a quantitative variable, and generates a raster layer of values of that variable, estimating its values from a set of independent variables (predictors) on which the main variable shows some dependency.

element.name: POINTS
element.text: The points layer with the dependent variable

element.name: FIELD
element.text: The attribute that will be used to extract the values for the analysis.

element.name: RESIDUALS
element.text: Points layer with the same points as the input layer and the following attributes: *Predicted value at the point *Known value at the point *Difference between these two values

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The output layer with the estimated values of the dependent variable.
